title: Ekko OP
body: Do they still do the new OP champ = More money for them thing? what a joke his barrier is OP and his pre Much a leblanc and has way too many escapes , his ult is pre much a guardian angel except with damage so good job

replies.body:
well ive played as him and i thought he was broken as fuck then i played against him and didnt have that much trouble
my diagnosis brain dead community
only thing i think needs nerfing is may the cooldown on his ult
see everyone said kalista was op on launch and same with reksai and same with zed and same with azir 
maybe you are all just not able to think about how to counter a champ and need your favourite youtuber to tell you

Riot, I also think you should nerf him as fast as you can. Sorry, there are often just some mad people who just lost against him, but seriously. I really think that he's op as fuck :/{{champion:245}} {{summoner:11}}
he needs the bigest fuckin nerf so broken
Yeah xD They need to get rid of Zilean too he has free Guardian Angel on his ult too PLS RITO BAN!!!! XD

But it takes a lot of skill to play him well.

Tell me, have you played with him, or against him?
damage output is high AP aswell
